explains: adj. 辉耀的；炽热的；发白热光的
wordGroup: incandescent lamp 白热灯，白炽灯
incandescent light n. 白炽灯；长明灯
incandescent bulb n. 白炽灯泡，白炽灯照

sentences.en: It cost far more than a regular incandescent bulb.
sentences.cn: 它比一只普通的白炽灯泡贵得多。

sentences.en: The momentum of incandescent lighting does not stop there.
sentences.cn: 白炽灯的发展势头并未就此止步。

sentences.en: The light of an electric lamp comes from an incandescent filament.
sentences.cn: 电灯光亮来自白炽灯丝。
